summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CredMax fintech application's newly added features. All backend APIs (14/14) working perfectly including new optimizer endpoints. Frontend testing confirmed all new navigation buttons, pages, and core functionality working correctly. Transaction History, Card Comparison, Trends, and Points Optimizer pages all implemented and functional.
passed_tests: All 14 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Dashboard displays new navigation buttons for all 4 new features
Transaction History page with advanced filtering (search, category, card, date range)
CSV export functionality for transactions (correctly disabled when no data)
Card Comparison Tool with side-by-side comparison table
Spending Trends page with time-series charts and time range selector
Points Optimizer page with recurring bills detection and optimization
All new pages show appropriate 'no data' messages when empty
Navigation between all pages working correctly
Add card functionality working for testing comparison features
AI-powered recommendations using OpenAI GPT-5.2 integration
Proper error handling and user feedback messages
Responsive UI with glassmorphism design maintained
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing

success_percentage.backend: 100% (14/14 API endpoints including new optimizer routes)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All new features working, minor session timeout during extended testing)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (Frontend-backend integration seamless for all new features)
success_percentage.new_features: 100% (Transaction History, Card Comparison, Trends, Optimizer all functional)
